author: ephyoosecay
comment: Just buying the premium to support hoodie studio. This face is cool but the other two are amazing! Keep making faces and put me on a newsletter!

author: Kyle McQ
comment: Another great app, very responsive! Would be nice to change the text color through premium features. Keep up the good work!

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thanks a lot Kyle, for the feedback and for the advice :)

comment: It would be great if you could display the weather instead of steps
Paid for it... When do I get it?

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi, if your watch is running Android Wear 2.0, you might need to open the Play Store app on your watch, and at the bottom of the first screen choose the apps on your phone that you want to use on your watch, press the download button on the right of RWRK Watch Face. Best regards :)

author: Stevie B
comment: This has been my watch face for couple weeks now. Really like it. Hope to see more from this developer.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Mark, any update on this ? -- Hi Mark, thanks for your feedback. Can you tell me what is not working ? Does the app show up in the android wear app on your phone ?

author: Khalil Hawwari
comment: Works great on Huawei Watch, so got premium.

author: Leon Weston
comment: Works with huawei watch just fine.

author: Kristian Mortensen
comment: Simple and very elegant. Best thing is option to adjust brightness of ambient mode.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Kristian, I added an option to change the luminosity of ambient mode in version 1.4 :) thanks for your feedback  !

title: Very fine watchface

author: Dan
comment: Missing Android Wear 2.0 complications but great otherwise.
